description:
We are excited to announce the continuation of Seth Larson’s work in the Security Developer-in-Residence role through the end of 2024 thanks to continued support from Alpha-Omega. (This six month extension is intended to align the renewal period for this role with the calendar year going forward).

The first year of the Security Developer-in-Residence initiative has been a success, seeing multiple improvements to the Python ecosystem's security posture. These improvements include authorizing the PSF as a CVE Numbering Authority, migrating the CPython release process to an isolated hosted build platform, and generating comprehensive Software Bill-of-Materials documents<
title: Security Developer-in-Residence role extended thanks to Alpha-Omega
